rr_role_table.name: reaction_roles
rr_role_table.create_query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 'reaction_roles' ('emoji_id' INT, 'role_id' INT, 'guild_id' INT, 'role_desc' VARCHAR)

rr_post_table.name: reaction_posts
rr_post_table.create_query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 'reaction_posts' ('message_id' INT, 'channel_id' INT, 'guild_id' INT)

logging_channel_table.name: server_logging
logging_channel_table.create_query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 'server_logging' ('guild_id' INT, 'channel_id' INT)

sales_feed_table.name: sales_feeds
sales_feed_table.create_query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 'sales_feeds' ('guild_id' INT, 'channel_id' INT, 'minimum_sale_amount' INT)
